p.3: We are looking for an experienced Data Scientist.
p.8: For the past 20 years, we have powered many Digital Experiences for the Fortune 500. Since 1999, we have grown from a few people to more than 4000 team members across the globe that are engaged in various Digital Modernization.
p.10: Experience as a data scientist working in a large scale enterprise environment
p.11: Hands on experiences with the following technology: Python, Jupyter, SageMaker or Google Colab, Scikit-learn, Matplotlib, Seaborn, Pandas, NumPy, etc.
p.12: Has prior experience productionizing time series forecasting, Regression, and Clustering algorithms at scale in a Cloud environment
p.14: Bachelor=E2=80=99s degree in a quantitative field (Statistics, Mathematics, Economics, Operations Research, Industrial Engineering, etc.)
p.15: Machine learning certifications are a plus
